H0.text: The Hel Peninsula is part of which European country. Denmark

H1.text: The Hel Peninsula is part of which European country. Germany

H2.text: The Hel Peninsula is part of which European country. Sweden

H3.text: The Hel Peninsula is part of which European country. Polnd

A4.text: Hel Peninsula is a 35-kilometre-long (22 mi) sand bar peninsula in northern Poland separating the Bay of Puck from the open Baltic Sea.

A5.text: It is located in Puck County of the Pomeranian Voivodeship.
